short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables discovery and viewing digital assets (NFTs) etched with the Etchly platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Etchly extension lights up a web3 experience in your browser, allowing NFT creators and enthusiasts to discover "Etched" NFT images, audio and video on the web. Within the extension (and Etchly.IO web site) view the embedded etching which proves authenticity,  shows you all on-chain and marketplace data along, and  reveals  special "Etch+" etchings that creators add to their NFTs to increase uniqueness and value.
